tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE car_regulatory_requirements (
  car_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  manufacturer VARCHAR(255),
  model VARCHAR(255),
  manufacturing_year INT,
  safety_rating DECIMAL,
  emissions_compliance BOOLEAN
)

CREATE TABLE car_regulations (
  car_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  brand VARCHAR(255),
  model VARCHAR(255),
  manufacturing_year INT,
  safety_rating INT,
  emissions_standard VARCHAR(255)
);

CREATE TABLE compliance_records (
  record_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  model_id INT,
  standard_id INT,
  requirement_id INT,
  compliance_date DATE,
  FOREIGN KEY (model_id) REFERENCES car_models(model_id),
  FOREIGN KEY (standard_id) REFERENCES safety_standards(standard_id),
  FOREIGN KEY (requirement_id) REFERENCES regulatory_requirements(requirement_id)
);

CREATE TABLE car_models (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  model_name VARCHAR(255),
  manufacturer_name VARCHAR(255),
  production_year INT,
  emission_standard VARCHAR(50)
)

CREATE TABLE car_regulations (
  regulation_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  regulation_name VARCHAR(255),
  description TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE car_violations (
  violation_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  violation_date DATE,
  violation_description TEXT,
  fine_amount DECIMAL(10, 2)
)

CREATE TABLE car_inspection (
  inspection_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  car_id INT,
  inspection_date DATE,
  result VARCHAR(50),
  inspector_name VARCHAR(100)
)

CREATE TABLE emission_tests (
  test_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  car_id INT,
  test_date DATE,
  emission_reading DECIMAL(8, 2),
  test_result VARCHAR(20)
)
